title: Drive by Kiss
description: Drive by Kiss is a young adult romance.Carly is a young adult taking her first road trip alone. Surprisingly, it turns into her first young adult romance.She's hoping for romantic scenic views filled with adventure. The last thing she expected was romance. But you know how it is...There's a hot guy in the car next to you. He glances over at you, you glance over at him. You never expect to meet him. It's just a passing moment...until it's not. Suddenly, you're swept up in romance, conflicted feelings, and wondering just how you got yourself into the situation. It's a bit much for any young adult.
author: Jacey Rhodes
